code: export function fetchSession(){return fetch('/api/v1/session',{method:'GET'}).catch(function(){return Promise.reject({error:'networkError'});}).then(function(response){if(response.ok){return response.json();}return response.json().catch(function(error){return Promise.reject({error:error});}).then(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});});}export function fetchLogout(){return fetch('/api/v1/session',{method:'DELETE'}).catch(function(){return Promise.reject({error:'networkError'});}).then(function(response){if(response.ok){return response.json();}return response.json().catch(function(error){return Promise.reject({error:error});}).then(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});});}export function fetchLogin(username){return fetch('/api/v1/session',{method:'POST',headers:new Headers({'content-type':'application/json'}),body:JSON.stringify({username:username})}).catch(function(){return Promise.reject({error:'networkError'});}).then(function(response){if(response.ok){return response.json();}return response.json().catch(function(error){return Promise.reject({error:error});}).then(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});});}export function fetchActiveUsers(room){return fetch("/api/v1/users/".concat(room),{method:'GET'}).catch(function(){return Promise.reject({error:'networkError'});}).then(function(response){if(response.ok){return response.json();}return response.json().catch(function(error){return Promise.reject({error:error});}).then(function(err){return Promise.reject(err);});});}
